name: Starship Survival
description:
Starship Survival was created during the Castle Game Jam in Sweden.

Connect with your Smartphone to the Server running on Windows or Mac.

All Clients need to be connected to the same Wifi network as the server!

Supports at least 10 Players, possibly many more.

Be one of the Starship's crew and ensure it's maintained so that will reach it's jump destination.

The game is in early Alpha right now. Specialised jobs and tasks will be added soon.

We'd be happy to hear what you think, and about any kind of feedback!

And if you actually manage to connect with a lot of people, you should totally send us a video or screenshot ; )

Thanks for playing!

GameVersion: 0.01

----------------------------------------------

Animation: Max Wrighton

3D Modeling: Gian Dbeis

Programming / Direction: Andreas Schönau

Programming: Svavar Melberg

Audio Programming: Milan Grajetzki
